name: .GTZIP File Extension
summary: Learn about .GTZIP files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open GTZIP files with StudioCoast GT Designer (included with the vMix download) in Windows. You can also edit the file with GT Designer. To open a GTZIP file with GT Designer, select File → Open.
You can also open a GTZIP file with StudioCoast vMix in Windows. To open a GTZIP file with vMix, select Add Input → Title, click Browse, then choose the GTZIP file you would like to open.

NOTE: Since GTZIP files are compressed with Zip compression, you can extract the contents stored in the GTZIP file by renaming the .gtzip file extension to .zip, then opening it with a Zip decompression utility.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
